<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Convert a date to a float number, based on Jan 1st 00:00:00 <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 0 and Dec 31st  23:59:59 <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1. The same day and time in leap year will be different after 28th of February and 23:59 on 31st of December will be 1.00274 <br><br>
This is how this command works. The 365 days of the year are presented in range 0...1. So each day will be:<br>
<tt>1 / 365 <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>  0.00273973</tt> <br>
In a leap year there are 366 days, so the range will increase by 1 day:<br>
<tt>1 / 365  *  366 <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1.00274</tt><br>
In short, in a normal year the command returns in range 0...1 in a leap year it will return in range 0...1.00274

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''dateToNumber''' date

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> date: [[Array]] - array in [[date]] format

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_float = [[dateToNumber]] [2035,7,6,12,0]; //0.510959</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[dateToNumber]] [[date]]; //will return float number for the current date.</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Calculate days from 1/1/1970: <code>fnc_daysFromEpoc = 
{
	[[private]] _year = [[param]] [0];
	[[private]] _days = 0;
	[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 1970 [[to]] _year - 1 [[do]] 
	{
		_days = _days + [[round]] [[linearConversion]] [0, 1, [[dateToNumber]] [_i, 12, 31, 23, 59], 0, 365, [[false]]];
	};
	_days + [[linearConversion]] [0, 1, [[dateToNumber]] _this, 0, 365, [[false]]];
};

[[hint]] [[str]] ([[date]] [[call]] fnc_daysFromEpoc);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[date]], [[daytime]], [[time]], [[numberToDate]]
</value></part></template>
